events.message: I am submitting a claim following a car accident that occurred last night involving significant damage to the vehicle and minor injuries.
The filed claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision and damages reported.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case and will be your primary contact for all further communications regarding the accident.
Your claim for the auto accident has been officially acknowledged and entered into our system for further processing.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any medical reports related to the accident for further assessment.
All requested documents, including police report, vehicle damage photos, and medical reports have been submitted for review.
Our investigation team has started examining the case details and submitted evidence to thoroughly understand the extent of the damages.
The investigation concerning the auto accident has been completed. All findings have been documented and assessed.
A settlement proposal has been sent detailing the coverable damages to your vehicle and injury claims for your review.
Received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement, appreciating the support and clarity provided during the claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved based on the investigation and document verification.
The approved settlement amount has been processed and payment issued to your registered bank account.
The claim associated with the auto accident has been officially closed following the successful payment issuance.
All records and documents related to your auto accident claim have been securely archived as per company policy.
